alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:39PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Meade and central Pennington Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 238 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Viewfield, or 23 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Viewfield around 245 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include New Underwood. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 73 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
